text:
[Verse]
City lights are glowing bright
Stars above are taking flight
Music loud in the summer night
Feel the rush this feels so right

[Verse 2]
Engine roaring down the lane
Wind that whispers through the pain
Open road is so insane
Midnight drive it's not in vain

[Chorus]
Cruising fast we feel alive
Letting go we start to dive
Heartbeats race under moonlight's jive
This is where our spirits thrive

[Verse 3]
Echoes of the city's hum
Passing places feeling numb
Destination never comes
All we have is the night's drum

[Chorus]
Cruising fast we feel alive
Letting go we start to dive
Heartbeats race under moonlight's jive
This is where our spirits thrive

[Bridge]
Speeding free in endless night
Chasing dreams in fading light
Holding on with all our might
In the dark we find our sight
title: Midnight Drive
